amendment.description: To ensure the protection of military and civilian personnel in the Department of Defense from an influenza pandemic, including an avian influenza pandemic.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1453 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1453 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To ensure the protection of military and civilian personnel in the Department of Defense from an influenza pandemic, including an avian influenza pandemic.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1453 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1453 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Obama.
